entries.femaleVariant: <mothertongue l="mex" m="Señor Todopoderoso, escucha a tu humilde servidora, que obra siempre en tu gracia…" b="" a=" Lord Almighty, lend thy ear to your humble servant, who serves forever in thy grace..."/>
V! Is it true what they say? You rolling around in the dirt with the Aldecaldos?
<mothertongue l="mex" m="pez gordo" b="Hey, V. Everyone's telling me you're a " a=" now. A big shot, eh?"/>
<mothertongue l="mex" m="¡Déjate de pendejadas!" b="V! " a=" Straight to voicemail again?!"/>

<mothertongue l="mex" m="Recibe en la luz cálida de tu reino a V, a quien llamaste a tu lado y deja este mundo perverso..." b="" a=" And bring unto your land of peaceful light the one whom you bid to depart from this cruel world, V..."/>
<kiroshi l="mex" o="... Y acéptala en compañía de tus santos. Amén." t="...and accept her into your fellowship of saints. Amen." b="" a=""/>
entries.maleVariant: <kiroshi l="mex" o="... Y acéptala en compañía de tus santos. Amén." t="...and accept him into your fellowship of saints. Amen." b="" a=""/>

entries.femaleVariant: May you rest in peace, V.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="mija" b="Have you lost your mind, " a="?"/>
entries.maleVariant: <mothertongue l="mex" m="mijo" b="Have you lost your mind, " a="?"/>

entries.femaleVariant: Didn't you get in enough trouble already, eh? Night City was too boring for you?
<mothertongue l="mex" m="Estás loca, eh!" b="" a=" Crazy, completely crazy."/>
entries.maleVariant: <mothertongue l="mex" m="Estás loco, eh!" b="" a=" Crazy, completely crazy."/>

entries.femaleVariant: Just watch out for yourself, OK? Don't do anything stupid, 'cause I'm not going to a second funeral!
Anyway... if you want to see some old faces, don't forget to stop by Mama Welles', OK? Just give me a call before, and I'll make my special chilaquiles, just for you.
<kiroshi l="mex" o="Cuídate, V." t="Take care, V." b="" a=""/>
Hehehe, so big you can't call me once a week? Once a month even?
Don't forget where you started – who you started with, hm?
<mothertongue l="mex" m="Mi casa es su casa. No se te olvide." b="My door is always open to you, V. There's always food on my table. " a=""/>
<kiroshi l="mex" o="Ahí te veo, V." t="See you later, V." b="" a=""/>
What's goin' on with you, eh? Lose your tongue, or what?
<mothertongue l="mex" m="sí, claro" b="Wait, what was I going to... Ah " a=", I wanted to tell you I--I'm cooking a supper on Sunday... for Jackie's birthday."/>
All his favorite food... Chilaquiles, tamales, if I can get some real corn, oy, maybe even elote, heh... It'd be nice if you could come over. Think about it.
<mothertongue l="mex" m="Cuídate, amorcito." b="" a=" Take care, love."/>
